name: LocatorLTE – Premium Store Locator
author: themegeekio

sections.installation:
1. Upload locatorLTE.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload locatorLTE.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

How to Install

  1. Upload locatorLTE.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

How to Use Plugin

  1. To use the plugin, After activating the plugin, place shortcode “[locatorlte]” in any page.
  2. Plugin will show “Branches” Tab.
  3. To use map service, you will need to enter Google Map API Key on locatorLTE Settings Page ( Settings > LocatorLTE Settings ).
